divs: Sighting DetailsWas looking up at stars, noticed an orange-yellow light. At first thought it was satilite. Object grew very bright than vanished. A few minutes later, a second light (white) follewed same path. This light repeated the brightness pattern then, dimmed and continued across the sky. Moments later a third dimmer orange light, same path again. This light did not brighten. Afterward, two bright orange objects lower in the sky (possibly military planes) seem to follow after. These planes had no becon lights, if they were planes. Finally, another light followed first path. This time certain it was satilite though.
trends: There have been 38 other sightings in South Bend
There were no other sightings in South Bend on or around May 28th 2012
Summary: Seen orange- yellow light, light brightened then vanished. Followed by white light, same path same change in brightness.
